name: Never skip leg day (Ultra Alpha Edition)
name_original: Never skip leg day (Ultra Alpha Edition)
description:
Hey y'all ! French guy here, it's my first game and I clearly know it's unfinished but i wanted to share it to the world ! Ring me up if you have feedbacks, I'll gladly listen to them !

I followed Shaun Spalding's tutorials and decided to explore a little bit further on certain details, in order to really understand how coding works. Now, I propose to you this bit of unfinished game with the flavor of hope ! (and the smell of-- well, you'll see)

And if you can't understand french, i'm really sorry for all the texts you won't understand.

Ctrl + F = widescreen

R = go back to Menu

0.1 fix : Fixed a very embarassing softlock and esthetic changes
